                   int mouseY,
                   boolean windowActive,
                   float partialTicks)
        Description copied from class: Component
        The main render loop. This is where you draw your component.
        Overrides:
        render in class Component
        Parameters:
        laptop - a Laptop instance
        mc - a Minecraft instance
        mouseX - the current x position of the mouse
        mouseY - the current y position of the mouse
        windowActive - if the window is active (at front)
        partialTicks - percentage passed in-between two ticks
